item.title: 矩阵迹的性质
item.description: 矩阵迹的性质 2021-08-16 Tags: #Trace #Matrix #Math 标量可以直接套上迹： $a=\operatorname{tr}(a)$ $\mathrm{tr}AB = \mathrm{tr}BA$ ^tracecommutative 左边: $$ \begin{align} &\sum^n_i a_{1i}b_{i1}+\sum^n_i a_{2i}b_{i2}+\cdots+\sum^n_i a_{mi}b_{im} \ = &\sum^m_j\sum^n_ia_{ji}b_{ij} \ = &\sum^m_i\sum^n_j a_{ij}b_{ji} \end{align} $$ 右边: $$ \begin{align} &\sum^m_i b_{1i}a_{i1}+\sum^m_i b_{2i}a_{i2}+\cdots+\sum^m_i b_{ni}a_{in} \ = &\sum^n_j\sum^m_i b_{ji}a_{ij} \ = &\sum^m_i\sum^n_j a_{ij}b_{ji} \end{align} $$
